#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
 {
   char a[100000]={};
   scanf("%s",&a);
   int i=0,count=0;
   while(a[i]!='\0')
   {
     int m=a[i]-'0';
     switch(m)
     {
     case 0:
     {cout<<"-----";break;}
    case 1:
     {cout<<".----";count++;break;}
    case 2:
     {cout<<"..---";count+=2;break;}
     case 3:
     {cout<<"...--";count+=3;break;}
    case 4:
     {cout<<"....-";count+=4;break;}
    case 5:
     {cout<<".....";count+=5;break;}
    case 6:
     {cout<<"-....";count+=4;break;}
    case 7:
     {cout<<"--...";count+=3;break;}
    case 8:
     {cout<<"---..";count+=2;break;}
    case 9:
     {cout<<"----.";count++;break;}

     }
   i++;
   }
   cout<<endl<<count<<endl;



 }


return 0;
}
